      • parseJson

        public static java.lang.String parseJson(java.lang.String path,
                         int price,
                         int pieces)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        A method to parse json result from a call to Zappos' API
        Parameters:
        path - path to get json value
        price - total price input
        pieces - number of gifts to buy
        Returns:
        String with products' names, prices and urls
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • combination

        public static void combination(int target,
               int n,
               int sum,
               int[] result)
        A method to generate all possible combination of prices that adds up to the input price
        Parameters:
        target - the total input price
        n - number of pieces a customer is willing to buy
        sum - current sum of all prices
        result - all possible combination of peices
